original: @213a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @213a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra satva m'a y'a dza la gu hya sarba a'a darsha n'a ma tantra /
analyzed: badzra satva m'a y'a dza la gu hya sarba a'a darsha n'a ma tantra /
translated: Vajrasattvamāyājālaguhyasarvādarśa-nāma-tantra.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud /🔽aom rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud / aom rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Tantra called the Mirror of All Secrets of the Net of Illusion of Vajrasattva.🔽Om. Homage to Vairocana.

original: h'um mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: h'um mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Hum. Homage to Akshobhya.

original: aam snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: aam snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Ah. Homage to Amitabha.

original: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Then the glorious Vajra Holder,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag /
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag /
translated: The secret lord of all the conquerors,

original: kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas //
analyzed: kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas //
translated: The one who is empowered by all and holds the treasure,

original: dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas //
analyzed: dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas //
translated: With a smile, wide-open eyes, and respect,

original: rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas //
translated: Having praised and circumambulated all the conquerors,

original: spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol //
analyzed: spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol //
translated: He respectfully sat before them and made this request:

original: @213b ae ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung //
analyzed: @213b ae ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung //
translated: Emaho! The speech of all the buddhas,

original: rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste //
analyzed: rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste //
translated: The king of all concepts,

original: cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud //
analyzed: cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud //
translated: The tantra that teaches the extensive ritual,

original: dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba //
analyzed: dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba //
translated: Stainless, profound, and difficult to fathom,

original: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud //
analyzed: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud //
translated: and the tantras of body, speech, and mind.

original: ma lus gtan la 'bobs pa 'di //
analyzed: ma lus gtan la 'bobs pa 'di //
translated: This is the complete explanation.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags //🔽sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags // sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de //
translated: What is Vajrasattva?🔽By what is the illusion taught?

original: dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan //🔽lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid //
analyzed: dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan // lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid //
translated: Why is it taught as the net tantra?🔽Why is it called the scripture?

original: gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: Why is it explained as the general?

original: gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu //
translated: What is the secret?

original: snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir //
analyzed: snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir //
translated: Why is it the meaning of the essence?

original: de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod //
analyzed: de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod //
translated: Why is it called reality?

original: nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir //
analyzed: nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir //
translated: Why is it called definitive?

original: mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs //
analyzed: mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs //
translated: To which person is this name given?

original: mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o //🔽thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi //
analyzed: mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o // thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi //
translated: This is the question of the name.🔽Why is it the teacher?

original: ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir; ;gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu //
analyzed: ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir; ;gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu //
translated: What is the place and retinue?

original: dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu //
analyzed: dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu //
translated: What is the time and the compiler?

original: mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya //
translated: What is Akṣobhya?

original: rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod //
translated: Why is he called Vairocana?🔽Why is he called Ratnasaṃbhava?

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir; ;snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir; ;snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir //
translated: Why is he called Amitābha?

original: don yod grub pa ji lta bu //
analyzed: don yod grub pa ji lta bu //
translated: Why is he called Amoghasiddhi?🔽Why is he called Locanā, Ākāśadhātvīśvarī,

original: spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang // gos dkar mo dang m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang // gos dkar mo dang m'a ma k'i //
translated: Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and Māmakī?🔽Why is he called Tārā?

original: sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir; ;sa yi snying po ci yi phyir //
analyzed: sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir; ;sa yi snying po ci yi phyir //
translated: Why is he called Kṣitigarbha?🔽Why is he called Ākāśagarbha, Avalokiteśvara,

original: nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod //
analyzed: nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod //

original: sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci //
analyzed: sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci //
translated: Why is he called Lāsya, Mālā, Gītā, and Nṛtyā?

original: byams dang sgrib sel kun @214a *//
analyzed: byams dang sgrib sel kun @214a *//
translated: Why is he called Maitreya, Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin,

original: bzang dang // 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir //
analyzed: bzang dang // 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir //
translated: and Mañjuśrī?🔽Why is he called the four times, Dhūpā, Puṣpā,

original: dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang // mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod //
analyzed: dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang // mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod //
translated: Ālokā, and Gandhā?🔽Why is he called Jayo, Yamāntaka,

original: rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ci //
analyzed: rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ci //
translated: Hayagrīva, and Amṛtakuṇḍali?🔽Why is he called Ānkuśī, Pāśī, Sphoṭā,

analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod //

original: yid dang chos bzang gnyis kyi phyir //
analyzed: yid dang chos bzang gnyis kyi phyir //
translated: For the sake of the mind and the two good dharmas,

analyzed: gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs //
translated: the principal one, please explain to me.

original: gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: Because of the uncommon

analyzed: nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las //

original: ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor //
analyzed: ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor //
translated: the teacher, teaching, place, retinue,

original: dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod //
analyzed: dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod //
translated: time, and compiler are expressed.

original: grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las //
analyzed: grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las //

analyzed: ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar //

original: bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu //
analyzed: bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu //
translated: are expressed, and the teaching and compiler🔽are not expressed.

original: skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol //
analyzed: skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol //

analyzed: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: This is the verse of the question of the nidāna.🔽Why are there two nidānas,

analyzed: gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur //

analyzed: gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing //

analyzed: thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //

analyzed: sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim //

original: gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol //
analyzed: gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol //

analyzed: 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //

original: skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso //

original: sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing //

analyzed: phun sum tshogs @214b pa chos kyi rje //

analyzed: gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs //

original: blta bya gang la ci yi phyir //
analyzed: blta bya gang la ci yi phyir //

analyzed: gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur //

original: rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci //
analyzed: rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci //

original: rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs //

original: gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci //

original: 'di ni lta ba'i dra ba 'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lta ba'i dra ba 'o //

original: thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir //
analyzed: thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir //

analyzed: shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang // rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang // 'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci //

analyzed: gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad //

analyzed: de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur //

original: gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i //
analyzed: gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i //

analyzed: sbyar ba'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs //

analyzed: 'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o //

analyzed: thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi //

analyzed: rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub gyi //

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir //

analyzed: ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang //

analyzed: lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba //

analyzed: gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang //

original: phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur //

analyzed: lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te //

original: gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu //

analyzed: gnyis @215a *// dang gsum dang drug bstan cing //

analyzed: don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems //

analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor //

analyzed: gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas //

analyzed: ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub //

analyzed: 'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci //

analyzed: yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel //

analyzed: gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po //

analyzed: gang gis gang la gang dag tu //

analyzed: ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs //

analyzed: gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel //

analyzed: skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu //

analyzed: 'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol //

analyzed: 'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du //

analyzed: las kyi rim pa ji lta bu //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po //

analyzed: bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol //

analyzed: rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsol //

analyzed: mchod dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i //

analyzed: bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu //

analyzed: gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub //

original: dgug dang bcing dang gso dang gsad //
analyzed: dgug dang bcing dang gso dang gsad //

analyzed: rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol //

analyzed: 'phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig /

analyzed: mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs // phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i //

translated: The path of the magical net.

original: rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis //
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis //
translated: Since the nature pervades everything,🔽The power of awareness becomes just as it is

original: dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis; ;rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas //
analyzed: dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis; ;rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas //
translated: Through the connection with the method of the actual empowerment.

original: khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin //
analyzed: khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin //
translated: This is the magic of the special method.

original: thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems //
translated: Vajrasattva without beginning

original: chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid //
translated: Is the nature of all phenomena.

original: zab mo bstan pa ci yi lung //
analyzed: zab mo bstan pa ci yi lung //
translated: What is the source of the profound teaching?🔽The tantra of the extensive ritual of imagination

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i //🔽rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i // rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud //
translated: Is the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas //
translated: From the beginning of countless eons,

original: shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan //
analyzed: shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan //
translated: Those who have trained in wisdom and have compassion,🔽Faith, diligence, and samaya,

original: dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang // cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis //
analyzed: dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang // cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis //
translated: And have trained in the pure ritual,

original: dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin //
analyzed: dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin //
translated: Are the domain of the highest capacity.

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di //
translated: This vehicle of the secret vajra

original: ngo bo nyid dang byin rlabs dang; ;mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang byin rlabs dang; ;mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste //
translated: The symbol, and the vajra accomplishment,

original: rdo rje theg pa bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa bde ba che //
translated: Are the great bliss of the Vajra Vehicle.🔽The evil-natured, the inferior,

original: rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang // phyin ci log dang mi mos dang // dbang dang dam tshig med pa la //
analyzed: rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang // phyin ci log dang mi mos dang // dbang dang dam tshig med pa la //
translated: The mistaken, the uninspired, and those without empowerment and samaya,🔽Are not vessels for the secret mantra.

original: gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs //🔽thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs // thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis //
translated: For the sake of secrecy, it is called the secret vehicle.🔽The secret essence should not be taught🔽To a disciple who is not a vessel

original: snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la //🔽gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na //
analyzed: snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la // gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na //
translated: By a master who lacks skillful means.

original: bdag @219a *// dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing //
analyzed: bdag @219a *// dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing //
translated: Both self and other will suffer,

original: sreg dang bsgribs par yun ring gnas //
analyzed: sreg dang bsgribs par yun ring gnas //
translated: And remain in burning and obscuration for a long time.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las; mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o ////
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las; mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o ////
translated: This is the first explanation of the meaning of the name from the Great Tantra of the Vajra Mirror of the Net of Magical Emanations.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, I will explain

original: thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don //
analyzed: thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don //
translated: The secret meaning that is not common,🔽To the uncommon retinue.

original: thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la; ;phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la; ;phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang //
translated: The victors of the ten directions and the vajra holders,

original: dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi //
translated: The maṇḍala is revealed.

original: rdo rje padma 'brel ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'brel ba yis //
translated: Through the union of the vajra and lotus,

original: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas //
translated: the empowerment of bodhicitta

original: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: is conferred on the common and uncommon

original: nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams //
analyzed: nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams //
translated: afflictions, views, and objects of knowledge.

original: skad cig yud la gsal byas te //🔽thun mong khyad par gsal ba yi //
analyzed: skad cig yud la gsal byas te // thun mong khyad par gsal ba yi //
translated: In an instant, they are clarified🔽and the two paths are definitely revealed

original: lam gnyis nges par ston pas na //
analyzed: lam gnyis nges par ston pas na //
translated: through the common and special clarifications.

original: ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is called “the teacher.”

original: de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba //
translated: The supreme place of that🔽is explained as the place of origin,🔽abiding, support,

original: 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang // mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang // mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro //
translated: and the consecration of the symbol.

original: thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis //
translated: Through the distinctions of method and path,

original: kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid //
analyzed: kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid //
translated: the nature of the Great Vajradhara

original: gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
analyzed: gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
translated: is abandoned in the pure class of the pure.🔽In the Akaniṣṭha realm, the supreme place,

original: 'og min gnas mchog chen po der; ;yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
analyzed: 'og min gnas mchog chen po der; ;yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
translated: the perfect Buddha became a buddha.

original: skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to tame unfortunate beings,

original: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
analyzed: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
translated: the emanation became a buddha here.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i @219b gnas; ;gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i @219b gnas; ;gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa //
translated: free from the pure and impure classes,

original: 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa //
translated: the end of worldly activity,

original: 'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: 'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
translated: the blazing celestial palace of Akaniṣṭha,🔽without any restriction in the ten directions,

original: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i; ;yon tan khyad par spags pa na //
analyzed: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i; ;yon tan khyad par spags pa na //
translated: the special qualities are heaped up.

original: gsang ba yum gyi bha ga la //
analyzed: gsang ba yum gyi bha ga la //
translated: In the secret bhaga of the mother,

original: bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan //
analyzed: bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan //
translated: endowed with the lord of the thirteenth stage,🔽great Vajradhara, immeasurable,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang // til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang // til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs //
translated: fully present in the manner of a sesame seed.

original: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of all phenomena,

original: thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i //
translated: without beginning, end, or middle,

original: rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni //
translated: the natural ultimate Akaniṣṭha,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir //
translated: the palace of all the victors.🔽The abode of all the victors

original: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i //🔽rgyal ba kun gyi rten pa'i gnas //
analyzed: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i // rgyal ba kun gyi rten pa'i gnas //
translated: of the past, present, and future,🔽the sign of those

original: de dag nye bar mtshan pa yi //
analyzed: de dag nye bar mtshan pa yi //
translated: is the celestial palace similar to that,

original: yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i //
analyzed: yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i //
translated: arisen from the mind and signs,

original: bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs; ;de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs; ;de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang //
translated: meditated, drawn, made, and so forth.

original: rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis //
translated: The Victorious One, through mantra and blessing,

original: der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas //
analyzed: der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas //
translated: Is the symbolic place for the sake of those who abide there.

original: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: The uncommon and the common

original: bsod nams ye shes khyad par can //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes khyad par can //
translated: Are the special merit and wisdom

original: bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i //
analyzed: bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i //
translated: That arise from various accumulations.

original: rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni //🔽gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
analyzed: rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni // gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
translated: The great perfect enjoyment

original: 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na //
analyzed: 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na //
translated: Is in the supreme place of Great Akaniṣṭha,🔽Which is free from the pure class.

original: rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku //
analyzed: rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku //
translated: The lord of the family is the spontaneously present form,

original: gcig dang ma rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: gcig dang ma rnam spangs pa //
translated: Free from one and many.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te //🔽gdod nas theg @220a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te // gdod nas theg @220a *//
translated: It is the universal form of all buddhas

original: mchog mdzod nyid phyir //
analyzed: mchog mdzod nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is the treasure of the supreme vehicle from the beginning.

original: sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la //
analyzed: sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la //
translated: For disciples who have abandoned the extremes of obscuration,

original: skad cig gcig gis spangs par mdzad //
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis spangs par mdzad //
translated: It is abandoned in an instant.

original: chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa //
analyzed: chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa //
translated: As many as are the various phenomena,

original: dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum //
analyzed: dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum //
translated: They are round because they are not different things.🔽The wheel is taught because of the four:

original: khyad par spags dang tshad med dang // ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan //
analyzed: khyad par spags dang tshad med dang // ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan //
translated: The special increase, the immeasurables, and the four kinds of wisdom.

original: chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the dharmadhātu is inseparable,

original: yu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor //
analyzed: yu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor //
translated: The outer enclosure is completely surrounded by a circle.

original: sku gsung thugs dang byin rlabs dang // thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang byin rlabs dang // thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because there is nothing that is not pervaded by the blessing of the body, speech, mind, and compassion,

original: yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyings su bstan //
analyzed: yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyings su bstan //
translated: they are explained in the dhātu of the proliferation of qualities.

original: rab byung ye shes mtha' bral bas //
analyzed: rab byung ye shes mtha' bral bas //
translated: Since the appearance of pristine consciousness is free from extremes,

original: phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong mi gnas pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong mi gnas pa'i //
translated: it does not abide in the coming and going of the ten directions.

original: tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir //
analyzed: tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir //
translated: Because the mind is free from measure,

original: gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan //
analyzed: gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan //
translated: the basis, root, and immeasurable are explained in the maṇḍala.

original: gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir //
analyzed: gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir //
translated: Because the essence is the original blessing,

original: ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de //
analyzed: ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de //
translated: the treasury is spontaneously perfect without being accumulated.

original: 'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it fulfills the hopes of migrating beings,

original: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //🔽sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i //
analyzed: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i //
translated: the celestial mansion blazes with jewels.🔽All phenomena, both entities and nonentities,

original: chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te //
analyzed: chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te //
translated: naturally abide in the essence.

original: bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir //
translated: Because there is no grasping to self and other,

original: phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med //
analyzed: phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med //
translated: there is no obscuration, free from inside and outside.

original: thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras //
analyzed: thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras //
translated: The result of the method is based on the common [vehicle].

original: ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid //
analyzed: ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid //
translated: Wisdom is the method itself.

original: gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas //
analyzed: gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas //
translated: Because they appear to the minds of those to be tamed,

original: glo 'bur bzhi ni @220b lhag par mdzes //🔽thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: glo 'bur bzhi ni @220b lhag par mdzes // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: The four turrets are especially beautiful.

original: gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun //
analyzed: gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun //
translated: All the high and low levels of those to be tamed,🔽Common and uncommon,

original: stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /
analyzed: stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /
translated: Enter into emptiness, aspiration, signlessness, and luminosity,🔽Therefore, the four doors of wisdom arise.

original: de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar; ;thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
analyzed: de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar; ;thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
translated: By the many methods that are inconceivable,

original: lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis //
analyzed: lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis //
translated: The eight paths are traversed in stages,

original: 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas //
analyzed: 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas //
translated: And the result is the perfection of all good qualities,

original: rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan //
analyzed: rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan //
translated: Therefore, the sixteen causes and results of the archways are shown.

original: zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas //
analyzed: zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas //
translated: Free from the path of attachment and abandonment,

original: 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te //
analyzed: 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te //
translated: The five amṛtas of the five sense objects are displayed,

original: bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas //
analyzed: bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas //
translated: And by pleasing all with the offering of oneself,

original: 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan //
analyzed: 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan //
translated: The sense objects are shown to be filled with goddesses.

original: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
translated: Those who possess method and wisdom🔽Have the method of nonattachment,

original: ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang // che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas //
analyzed: ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang // che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas //
translated: And the qualities of greatness are spontaneously perfected,

original: nyi zla padma rin po che //
analyzed: nyi zla padma rin po che //
translated: Therefore, the sun, moon, lotus, and jewels

original: las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis; ;byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che //
analyzed: las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis; ;byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che //
translated: By the karma, compassion, and aspirations of the bodhisattvas,

original: smon lam dbang gis de dag tu //
analyzed: smon lam dbang gis de dag tu //
translated: Through the power of aspiration, they dwell

original: thos pa rgya mtsho gsog phyir gnas //
analyzed: thos pa rgya mtsho gsog phyir gnas //
translated: In those places in order to gather an ocean of learning.

original: de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang //
analyzed: de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang //
translated: At that time, free from the harshness of time,

original: ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus //
analyzed: ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus //
translated: The essence is the time of the equality of the four times.

original: dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas //
analyzed: dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas //
translated: Since the limit of time is realized,

original: thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan //
analyzed: thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan //
translated: It is taught as the extraordinary time.

original: de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis //
analyzed: de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis //
translated: At that time, the victors of the ten directions

original: bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa //
analyzed: bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa //
translated: Give prophecies for ten million eons.

original: 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /
translated: The one who is the lord of secrets,

original: lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad //
analyzed: lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad //
translated: Vajrapāṇi, compiles the teachings.

original: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir //
translated: Because of being blessed by the victors of the three times,

original: 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan //
translated: The one with the supreme fortune in the retinue

original: gsang ba'i @221a *//
analyzed: gsang ba'i @221a *//
translated: Gathers the secret

original: rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas //
translated: Vajradharas

original: 'dul ba'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad //🔽'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad // 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
translated: And teaches the wheel of discipline.🔽The three kāyas of the past,🔽The present, and the future are ascertained in the mind.

original: sku gsum sku gsum thugs nges pa'i; ;de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis //
analyzed: sku gsum sku gsum thugs nges pa'i; ;de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis //
translated: By whatever method,

original: gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i //
analyzed: gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i //
translated: The one who has gone, is going, and will go

original: thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa //
analyzed: thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa //
translated: The three liberations, pristine consciousness, and the six perfections.

original: zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab //
translated: The qualities of the buddhafields are inconceivable.

original: bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i //
analyzed: bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i //
translated: The gathering of all eighty of those

original: rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan //
analyzed: rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan //
translated: is the name of all the ocean of victors.

original: gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas //
analyzed: gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas //
translated: Because of being included in the vajra mind,

original: las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas //
analyzed: las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas //
translated: karma, conduct, austerities, and the mountain of existence are unshakable.

original: de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs //
analyzed: de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the supreme Akshobhya.

original: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis //
translated: Through the union of method and wisdom,🔽however many appearances of body, speech, and mind there are,

original: ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba; ;mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba; ;mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis //
translated: the appearance of the various aspects of interest and method

original: sna bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog /
analyzed: sna bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog /
translated: is the supreme appearance of Vairochana.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni //
translated: The qualities of all the victors

original: tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste //

analyzed: rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin //

analyzed: de las thabs des mngon byas pas //

analyzed: sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim // gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i //

analyzed: gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdams pa dang // gnyis su med pas bde chen po //

analyzed: rang lus snang srid brtan g-yo la //

analyzed: rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar //

analyzed: de dag ma lus dran byed pa //

analyzed: kun tu bzang por de bshad do // ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos //

analyzed: ma lus zad med khyab pa'i dbyings // rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa //

analyzed: kun tu bzang mor de bshad do //

analyzed: mi shigs thig le bde chen po //

analyzed: dharma tsakra chos kyi gnas //

analyzed: dag gis // lus can kun la khyab par gnas //

analyzed: rang byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid //

analyzed: rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste //

analyzed: ye shes nam mkhar gsal 'dod pa //

analyzed: bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par //

analyzed: nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku //

analyzed: dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas //

analyzed: brjod med bstan pa gsung mdzad cing //

analyzed: byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa //

analyzed: 'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: ma ni ma nu ma ta ste //

analyzed: sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos //

analyzed: las can rnam shes de dag gis //

analyzed: gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod //

original: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //

analyzed: thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos //

analyzed: bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe //

analyzed: bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod //

analyzed: shes pa rten dang brten par bcas //

analyzed: thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas //

analyzed: rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni //

analyzed: gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa //

analyzed: brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas //

analyzed: dbyer med ye shes gcig gi dang // rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las //

analyzed: sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul //

analyzed: de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang //

analyzed: lha min ston pa phrag dog rje //

analyzed: mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste //

analyzed: byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa //

analyzed: yi dvags drag pos gdung ba sel //

analyzed: gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar //

analyzed: la la lha las 'pho ba dang // la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa dang // dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas //

analyzed: rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa //

analyzed: de tshe 'gro ba so so yang //

original: bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang //
analyzed: bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang //
translated: Although wisdom appears for one’s own sake,

original: gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas //
translated: For others’ sake, it is not realized.

original: rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang //
analyzed: rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang //
translated: The essence of the nature is primordially secret.

original: shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don //
analyzed: shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don //
translated: The meaning of the extremely hidden secret

original: de nyid legs par bshad pa'i don //
analyzed: de nyid legs par bshad pa'i don //
translated: Is the meaning that is explained well.

original: ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la //🔽ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis //
analyzed: ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la // ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis //
translated: The primordial secret of equality🔽Is the essence of the sugata.🔽It appears as the suffering of saṃsāra

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ngo bor snang //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ngo bor snang //
translated: Through the power of conditions of ignorance and misconception.

original: de nyid bde gshegs snying po de //
analyzed: de nyid bde gshegs snying po de //
translated: That itself is the essence of the sugatas,

original: dngos med dngos po'i snying po can //
analyzed: dngos med dngos po'i snying po can //
translated: Which is without substance and has the essence of substance.

original: 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to ripen migrating beings,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of body, speech, and mind,

original: sprul ba rnams ni rnam bar @226b 'phrul; ;sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi //
analyzed: sprul ba rnams ni rnam bar @226b 'phrul; ;sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi //

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor //
translated: The wheel of dharma is turned🔽With various bodies, speech, and minds.

original: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang //
translated: Those maṇḍalas of victors

original: ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig /
analyzed: ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig /
translated: The teacher and retinue, one to another,🔽The father and mother, nondual,

analyzed: yab dang yum dang gnyis med dang // gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba //

original: brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te //
analyzed: brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te //

original: bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur //

original: 'phen pa chung gi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'phen pa chung gi sbyor ba yis //
translated: The application of the small impetus

original: thabs des yum la gang bskul bas //
analyzed: thabs des yum la gang bskul bas //

original: gnyis med 'brel pa'i chags pa'i 'od //
analyzed: gnyis med 'brel pa'i chags pa'i 'od //
translated: The light of passion, the nondual union,

original: sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the thirteen abodes

original: bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing //
analyzed: bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing //

original: nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas //

original: bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro //
translated: The taste of the clear pristine consciousness of bliss🔽Is known from arising, joy, abiding,

analyzed: skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang // 'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur //

analyzed: gang gis gang la gang bslangs pas // gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las //

analyzed: ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas //
translated: Whatever appears clearly from those

original: snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas //
analyzed: snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas //
translated: Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those

original: nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang snang //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang snang //
translated: Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.🔽Whatever appears clearly from those🔽Is the appearance of the pristine consciousness of the elements.

original: nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin //🔽gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la //
analyzed: nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin // gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la //
translated: The inner invocation is the great method.🔽Because of the method,

original: chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul //
analyzed: chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul //
translated: wisdom is invoked with the song of passion.

original: shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang //
analyzed: shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang //
translated: Wisdom also invokes the method🔽with the song and dance of passion

original: sha da pa yi glu gar dang // sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis //🔽phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas //
analyzed: sha da pa yi glu gar dang // sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis // phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas //
translated: and the stage of the application of mantra.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis @227a *//
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis @227a *//
translated: The nonduality of method and wisdom

original: med pa'i // rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis //🔽dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de //
analyzed: med pa'i // rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis // dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de //
translated: is the movement of the vāyu.🔽The method of summoning and attracting🔽is the descent, retention, reversal,

original: dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis //
analyzed: dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis //

original: bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po //🔽thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po // thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
translated: The creation, completion, and great completion

original: mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'i //
analyzed: mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'i //
translated: arise from the stage of the ultimate.

original: kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste //
analyzed: kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste //
translated: All of those are the appearances of the five minds.🔽The bindu that arises from the method,🔽the bindu of the secret of wisdom,

original: thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang // shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba'i //
analyzed: thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang // shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba'i //
translated: and the bindu that arises from nondual bliss🔽are the three bindus.

original: sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur //
translated: The five minds appear in sequence.

original: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba //
analyzed: sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba //
translated: Arises from body, speech, and mind.

original: bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa //
analyzed: bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa //
translated: The collection of all the eighty-four

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te //

analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas; ;thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis //
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses of body, speech, mind, and so on

original: 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Are the seal of all migrating beings🔽Through the connection of method and nature.🔽The entire universe and beings

original: snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis //🔽ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas //
analyzed: snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis // ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas //
translated: Abide as the innate nature of bliss.

original: g-yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin //
analyzed: g-yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin //
translated: Because of movement, arising, aspiration, engagement, abiding, and completion,🔽The five pristine consciousnesses of the basis of birth, the method,

original: skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang // skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga //
analyzed: skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang // skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga //
translated: And the completion of birth

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //
translated: Are the nature of all buddhas.

original: ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas //
translated: They abide just as they are.

original: 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis //
translated: The differences in the aspirations of migrating beings

original: gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od //
analyzed: gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od //
translated: Are the forms, colors, mantras, lights,

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas //
translated: Maṇḍalas, and so on.

original: gang zag blo dang @227b 'tsham par bstan //
analyzed: gang zag blo dang @227b 'tsham par bstan //
translated: They are taught according to the mind of the individual.

original: rten dang brten can las byung ba'i //
analyzed: rten dang brten can las byung ba'i //
translated: The fire of great bliss that arises from the support and the supported

original: rang byung bde chen me rtog pa //
analyzed: rang byung bde chen me rtog pa //
translated: Is imagined to be self-originated.🔽The way of being filled with the all-pervading nonduality

original: lus med lus la gnas pa yi //🔽khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul //🔽gang phyir zag med bde ba yi //
analyzed: lus med lus la gnas pa yi // khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul // gang phyir zag med bde ba yi //
translated: Resides in the body that is without a body.🔽Because of the special bliss of samādhi

original: ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can //
analyzed: ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can //
translated: That is undefiled bliss,

original: rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang // byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang // byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni //
translated: The deity of the imagined nature, the apparent deity, and the deity of the power of blessing

original: phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs //
translated: Are united with the body, speech, and mind of the entire outer and inner universe.

original: ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung //
analyzed: ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung //
translated: The three yogas arise from the three.

original: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag /
analyzed: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag /
translated: The nāḍīs, vāyus, and bindus🔽Are the vāyus of reliance, union,

original: rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang // 'phen dang sdud pa rlung gis te //
analyzed: rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang // 'phen dang sdud pa rlung gis te //
translated: Projection, and retraction.

original: dvangs mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug /🔽steng dang 'og las byung ba yi //
analyzed: dvangs mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug / steng dang 'og las byung ba yi //
translated: The vāyu of gnosis enters the pure essence.

original: bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag /
analyzed: bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag /
translated: The stages of the bindus of bliss🔽That arise from above and below

original: dvangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: dvangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis //
translated: Are the result of the pure and impure vāyus.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid //🔽rkyen gyis nus pa phrad pa ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid // rkyen gyis nus pa phrad pa ltar //
translated: The result that is desired🔽Is the power of the condition that meets the cause.

original: rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang //
analyzed: rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang //
translated: The single cause appears as individual powers.

original: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i //
translated: The transcendent and mundane paths🔽Arise from the channels, bindus, and energies,🔽The outer and inner, the pure and impure,

original: lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang // rlung ni phyi nang dvangs snyigs dang // lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung //
analyzed: lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang // rlung ni phyi nang dvangs snyigs dang // lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung //

original: gang phyir med dang nus pa med //
analyzed: gang phyir med dang nus pa med //
translated: Because of the absence of power and potential,

original: stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis //
analyzed: stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis //
translated: The power of emptiness and perversion,

original: rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing //
analyzed: rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing //
translated: One’s body is destroyed and suffers,

original: dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur //
analyzed: dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur //
translated: And the faculties become impaired and inferior.

original: gang phyir thun mong thun mong min //
analyzed: gang phyir thun mong thun mong min //
translated: Because of the common and uncommon,

original: sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa //🔽rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du //🔽gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i //
analyzed: sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa // rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du // gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i //
translated: The five minds and the five wisdoms are taught.

original: sems lnga yun ring thung @228a *//
analyzed: sems lnga yun ring thung @228a *//
translated: The five minds, long and short,🔽Are based on the nature, samadhi, and reflections,🔽The mudra, and the family.

original: bcas pas // bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa //
analyzed: bcas pas // bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa //
translated: All phenomena of self and other

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te //
translated: Are the connate wisdom.

original: dngos bo ma yin dngos med min //
analyzed: dngos bo ma yin dngos med min //
translated: It is not a thing or a nonthing,

original: bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min //
analyzed: bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min //
translated: Not self, other, both, or neither.

original: rang byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid //
analyzed: rang byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid //
translated: The illusion of the self-originated great bliss

original: rdo rje brtan po rang snang ba //
analyzed: rdo rje brtan po rang snang ba //
translated: Is the vajra, the firm, self-appearance.

original: ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub //
translated: The illusory wisdom is spontaneously present.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Great Secret Mirror of Vajrasattva's Magical Net:

original: gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: The third chapter explaining the introduction.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain further

original: kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa //
analyzed: kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa //
translated: the object of knowledge of all,🔽the explanation of the domain.

original: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
analyzed: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
translated: All phenomena without exception

original: gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i //
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i //
translated: are free from one and many.

original: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness without end or middle🔽is uniform, free from all exaggeration and denigration.

original: sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las; ;rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las //
analyzed: sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las; ;rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las //
translated: From the difference between realization and nonrealization

original: sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul //🔽gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i //
analyzed: sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul // gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i //
translated: the various phenomena manifest.🔽The suchness beyond basis and root

original: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
translated: is without end or middle.

original: dngos med dngos po yul 'das la //🔽'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi //
analyzed: dngos med dngos po yul 'das la // 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi //
translated: The nonentity that transcends the domain of entities🔽is the great, uniform, secret domain.🔽The various essences of samsara and nirvana

original: ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba //
analyzed: ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba //
translated: are self-apparent.

original: gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid //
analyzed: gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid //
translated: The nondual great method is the vajra itself.

original: ae ma'o gnyis med bde chen las //
analyzed: ae ma'o gnyis med bde chen las //
translated: Emaho! From the nondual great bliss

original: sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang // rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang // bde sdug dbang po bye brag dang // rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul //
analyzed: sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang // rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang // bde sdug dbang po bye brag dang // rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul //
translated: and various natures are emanated.

original: sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' @228b tshon ltar //
analyzed: sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' @228b tshon ltar //
translated: Like an illusion, the moon in water, or a rainbow,

original: byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas //
translated: they abide in the essence of bodhicitta.

original: las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba //🔽rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis //
analyzed: las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba // rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis //
translated: Whatever appears through karma and conditions🔽is seen as different through individual clinging.

original: dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: The various specific faculties

original: rtog pa'i nus ba sna tshogs mthong //🔽rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings //
analyzed: rtog pa'i nus ba sna tshogs mthong // rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings //
translated: see the various potencies of thoughts.🔽The dhātu that lacks a basis or foundation

original: lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i //🔽ma mthong log zhen brtas pa yis //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i // ma mthong log zhen brtas pa yis //
translated: is the essence of the five pristine consciousnesses.🔽The power of the deluded maṇḍala🔽appears through the increase of clinging to the unreal

original: 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang //🔽'khor ba ma gsal dag pa yi //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang // 'khor ba ma gsal dag pa yi //
translated: that is not seen.🔽The pure field of nonapparent saṃsāra🔽and the enjoyments of the field

original: zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang // ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang // mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i //
analyzed: zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang // ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang // mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i //
translated: are the immeasurable field of the buddhas.

original: sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon tan 'phrin las rang snang ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon tan 'phrin las rang snang ba //
translated: The various forms, speech, mind, qualities, and activities are naturally apparent.

original: bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don //
analyzed: bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don //
translated: The benefit for self and other is spontaneously present.

original: sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
analyzed: sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: ma bsags lhun gyis grub pa'i sku; ;sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i //
analyzed: ma bsags lhun gyis grub pa'i sku; ;sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i //
translated: the spontaneously present kāya is not accumulated.

original: kun la yid bzhin mthun par snang //
analyzed: kun la yid bzhin mthun par snang //
translated: It appears to all as a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: kun kyang rang byung byang chub sems //
analyzed: kun kyang rang byung byang chub sems //
translated: All are self-originated bodhicitta.

original: bden pa dbyer med don du snang //
analyzed: bden pa dbyer med don du snang //
translated: It appears as the meaning of the inseparable truths.

original: gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar //
analyzed: gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar //
translated: Because it is like the nature of space,

original: gang la de ltar snang ba las //
analyzed: gang la de ltar snang ba las //
translated: it appears in that way to everyone.

original: yang dag gcig tu gzung du med //
analyzed: yang dag gcig tu gzung du med //
translated: It cannot be apprehended as a single, true entity.

original: ma bcos rang byung zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: ma bcos rang byung zhi ba nyid //
translated: It is unfabricated, self-originated, and peace itself.

original: rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste //

analyzed: byis pa la sogs tha dad de // la lar dgod dang drag po dang // gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang // la lar de bzhin chags chen po //

original: g-yo sgyu spyod dang g-yem par ston //🔽zhi dang sku dang phrag dog spyod //
analyzed: g-yo sgyu spyod dang g-yem par ston // zhi dang sku dang phrag dog spyod //

original: 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe //
analyzed: 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe //

analyzed: zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang // ngo mtshar che 'phrul du ma dag /
translated: in some places with miraculous powers in the buddha fields, in some places with many amazing miracles,

original: gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag /
analyzed: gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag /
translated: whatever is done,

original: skye bo ma lus 'dul pa'i phyir //
analyzed: skye bo ma lus 'dul pa'i phyir //

original: mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston //
analyzed: mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston //

original: zhi la tshangs dang khrol khro //
analyzed: zhi la tshangs dang khrol khro //

original: thar ba na chung mdzed dang rol //
analyzed: thar ba na chung mdzed dang rol //

original: gdung @234b dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba //
analyzed: gdung @234b dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba //

original: rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i //
analyzed: rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i //

original: sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston //
analyzed: sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston //

analyzed: byin gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang // brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang // tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang // shin tu rgyal dang phrag dog dang // 'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan //

analyzed: rtsub dang drag dang spom phra dang // ring thung rol mo lha klu dang // mi dang mi min 'byung po'i sgra //

analyzed: khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang // chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i //
translated: Passionate, violent, and so on,

original: sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa //

original: dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni //

original: gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang //
analyzed: gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang //

analyzed: la lar byams dang sdang ba dang // g-yeng dang mi g-yeng rmongs dang ri //

analyzed: sdud dang mi sdud yal ba  dang // grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang // ma rig ye shes la sogs pa //

original: thugs kyi rol ba mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: thugs kyi rol ba mtha' yas pa //

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang //

analyzed: mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid // lung dang rigs pa man ngag gis //
translated: The supreme inseparability of the infinite🔽is sought with valid knowledge

original: tshad ma dag gis gang bcal ba //
analyzed: tshad ma dag gis gang bcal ba //
translated: through scripture, logic, and esoteric instructions.

original: shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur //
analyzed: shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur //

analyzed: de nas chos rnams ma lus pa // bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i //

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang //

analyzed: mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid / d /ran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis //

analyzed: dus gsum rgya @235a *// mtsho gting lta bur //
translated: is the practice of the three doors🔽that are equalized through mindfulness, alertness, and stability.🔽Like the unmoving depths of the ocean,

analyzed: mi g-yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas // sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis //

original: dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste //
analyzed: dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste //

original: de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te //

original: stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad //
analyzed: stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad //

original: de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa //
analyzed: de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa //

original: rang byung byang chub sems nyid phyir //
analyzed: rang byung byang chub sems nyid phyir //
translated: are the self-originated state of bodhicitta.

original: gang snang rang rgyud dngos med de //
analyzed: gang snang rang rgyud dngos med de //

original: sgyu ma mig yor brag ca dang // rmig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa //
analyzed: sgyu ma mig yor brag ca dang // rmig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa //

analyzed: gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs //

analyzed: mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya // gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang // ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas //

analyzed: kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag /
translated: The conduct of compassion for all

original: dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya //
analyzed: dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya //
translated: is practiced by this holy one.🔽The nature, the deliberate visualization,

original: rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang // khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i //
analyzed: rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang // khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i //

analyzed: snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad //

analyzed: de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid //

original: rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis //
analyzed: rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis //

analyzed: cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir //

original: rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba //
analyzed: rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba //

analyzed: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar //

original: sa bon gang las thabs cho gas //
analyzed: sa bon gang las thabs cho gas //

original: 'phro 'du zhu nas mngon gyur pa //
analyzed: 'phro 'du zhu nas mngon gyur pa //

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang //

original: de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis //
analyzed: de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis //

original: brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te //
analyzed: brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te //

analyzed: mdun dang gzhan du skabs @235b dag sbyor; ;gcig dang nges med rim pa dang // 'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur //

original: gang gis gang de ma brtan par //
analyzed: gang gis gang de ma brtan par //

original: 'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de //
analyzed: 'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de //

original: skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis //
analyzed: skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis //

original: gang bsgoms gsal par mngon du 'gyur //
analyzed: gang bsgoms gsal par mngon du 'gyur //

analyzed: tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang // lam gyi 'drel bar bya ba dang // dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas //

analyzed: rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya //

analyzed: de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la //

analyzed: bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i //

analyzed: sgo gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas; ;thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la //

analyzed: sgo gsum mnyam gzhag rjes thob med //

analyzed: gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir //

analyzed: phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya // de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang // bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar //
translated: I will begin the practice of one part.🔽Then, in order to stabilize and increase

analyzed: gang de rim par brtan 'phel phyir //
translated: the familiarization with the root and the special trainings,

original: yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom //

analyzed: 'khor lo'i rtsa ba lha dag kyang //

analyzed: yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom //

analyzed: yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom //

analyzed: mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug pa 'dul //

analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yi // tshom bu rim par bsgom par bya //

analyzed: dgon pa'i rim pa 'am nags tshal dang // chu 'gram ri rtse dur khrod dang // skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste //

analyzed: dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i //
translated: Without enemies or the faults of the directions,🔽In a place that is suitable and agreeable,

analyzed: brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa yis; ;shes dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su // gzhal yas rim brtsegs mjes ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the stages of examination,🔽One should create a beautiful

analyzed: rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la //

analyzed: ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs //

analyzed: mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis sbyang //

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis //

analyzed: bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas //

analyzed: bar chad med par bsgrub par bya //

analyzed: gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par //

analyzed: de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad //

analyzed: lus can 'gro ba thams cad la //

analyzed: tsa kra bzhi dang sku gsung thugs //

analyzed: gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas //

analyzed: rtsa zhes de la mngon bshad de //

analyzed: bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar ba me //

analyzed: thig le chu dang 'dzin pas //

analyzed: ma lus bde ba chen po nyid //

analyzed: de la de yis rgyas btab pas //

analyzed: de nas bde ba chen po nyid //

analyzed: ma lus thams cad gsal bar gnas //

analyzed: phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de //

analyzed: mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis //

analyzed: ma lus pa dag ma btang bar //

analyzed: nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis //

analyzed: ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi /

analyzed: nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma bskams par //

analyzed: de dag mngon du brdul bar mdzad //

analyzed: la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung nyid //

analyzed: la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid; ;la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste //

analyzed: la lar padma de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: la lar sna tshogs las su bcas //

analyzed: rdo rje ba spu pu gnas //

analyzed: pho nya bye ba drug cu dag /

analyzed: phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkye ste //

analyzed: blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas //

analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad //

original: 'di la rim pa med pa ste //
analyzed: 'di la rim pa med pa ste //

original: skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs //
analyzed: skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs //

original: ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid //
analyzed: ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid //

analyzed: khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste //

analyzed: rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //

analyzed: dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid //

original: gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas //
analyzed: gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas //

analyzed: phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun //

original: goms nas spos med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: goms nas spos med de bzhin nyid //

original: de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid //
analyzed: de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid //

original: mi shigs thig le dvangs @246b ma'i bdag /
analyzed: mi shigs thig le dvangs @246b ma'i bdag /

original: bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med //
analyzed: bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med //

original: rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid //

original: thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //

original: ye shes lnga yi ri dang bcas //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi ri dang bcas //

original: bde chen skye ba med pa'i don //
analyzed: bde chen skye ba med pa'i don //

original: zag med khyab pa mngon du smin //
analyzed: zag med khyab pa mngon du smin //

original: ye shes nas mkha'i gzugs can nyid //
analyzed: ye shes nas mkha'i gzugs can nyid //

original: phyi nang med pa'i rang byung ste //
analyzed: phyi nang med pa'i rang byung ste //

original: gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
translated: And has the nature of clarity and bliss.

original: thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas //
analyzed: thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas //

original: lus can kun la gsal bar skye; ;gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dvangs ma nyid //
analyzed: lus can kun la gsal bar skye; ;gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dvangs ma nyid //

original: rten can brten par bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: rten can brten par bcas pa nyid //

original: rang byung thig le bde ba nyid //
analyzed: rang byung thig le bde ba nyid //

original: phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas //
analyzed: phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas //

original: bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur //

original: rang byung snying po dvangs ma'i lus //
analyzed: rang byung snying po dvangs ma'i lus //

original: 'byung ba zag med snying por thim //
analyzed: 'byung ba zag med snying por thim //

original: thig le spros pa med pa ste;/
analyzed: thig le spros pa med pa ste;/

original: thams cad ma lus khyab par snang //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus khyab par snang //

original: rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun //
analyzed: rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun //

original: snyigs ma dvangs mar smin byas te //
analyzed: snyigs ma dvangs mar smin byas te //

analyzed: dvangs ma ye shes snying por gsal // de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi //

original: rang byung thig le spros pa med //
analyzed: rang byung thig le spros pa med //

original: dvangs ma zag med stobs las snang //
analyzed: dvangs ma zag med stobs las snang //

analyzed: gang phyir skyes dang @247a *//

analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las //

original: skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe //
analyzed: skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe //

original: nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las //
analyzed: nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las //

original: dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal //
analyzed: dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal //

analyzed: sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid; ;brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid //

analyzed: gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa //

analyzed: rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang //

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i //

analyzed: rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas //

analyzed: ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad //

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal //

original: ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs //
analyzed: ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs //

analyzed: dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur //

analyzed: 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi; ;ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad //

analyzed: gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor bas //

analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i //

analyzed: @247b rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid //

analyzed: ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba //

original: de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom //

original: de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar //
analyzed: de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar //

original: gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom //
analyzed: gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom //

analyzed: yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang // chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya //

analyzed: de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid //

analyzed: gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yis //

analyzed: ma dag pa ni sbyangs byas te //

analyzed: dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya //

analyzed: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dag /

analyzed: rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom //

original: mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho //
analyzed: mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho //

analyzed: sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril // nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin //

analyzed: phreng 'dzin m'a le nam mkha'i mdog / spyan ras le brgan padma dkar //

analyzed: g'i ti pi wang dmar mo mdog /

analyzed: gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin //

analyzed: @248b btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste //

analyzed: spos dang mar me me tog dri //

analyzed: 'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs //

original: sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du //

analyzed: stobs chen gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi //

analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa lcag sgrog dril //

analyzed: sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs //

analyzed: khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni; ;kun bzang yab yum nam mkha'i mdog /

analyzed: phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te //

analyzed: mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro ba'i steng //

original: rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa 'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa 'o //
translated: of the vajra and bell.🔽The six sages are white, yellow, blue,

original: thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang // dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste //
analyzed: thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang // dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste //

original: phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul //

original: pi wang go cha seg par bsgom //
analyzed: pi wang go cha seg par bsgom //

original: po ti me chur shes par bya //
analyzed: po ti me chur shes par bya //
translated: Understand the book, fire, and water.

original: mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa //
analyzed: mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa //

original: rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan //

original: gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te //
analyzed: gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te //

original: ya m'anta krita rtag pa'o //
analyzed: ya m'anta krita rtag pa'o //

original: thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid //🔽sku gsung thugs 'bar byin rlabs ldan //
analyzed: thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid // sku gsung thugs 'bar byin rlabs ldan //

original: rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan //

original: cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya //
analyzed: cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya //

original: dvangs ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid //
analyzed: dvangs ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid //

original: ma bcos de bzhin @249a *//🔽nyid yin te //
analyzed: ma bcos de bzhin @249a *// nyid yin te //

original: ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel //

original: kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis //

original: khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid //

original: tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas //
analyzed: tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas //
translated: From whatever ordinary thoughts there are,

original: bde ba chen por byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: bde ba chen por byin gyis rlobs //
translated: bless them as great bliss.

original: 'byung lnga dvangs ma'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: 'byung lnga dvangs ma'i snying po nyid //

original: thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te //
analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te //
translated: are the cause of everything.

original: dharma tsakra chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: dharma tsakra chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The dharmacakra is the dharmadhātu,

original: mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas //
translated: the indestructible bindu, the place of all.

original: nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi //
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi //
translated: The subtle and coarse differences in potential🔽are the forms of the bindus, feelings,

original: thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid //
translated: discriminations, mental formations, and consciousnesses.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
translated: They are the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin //
analyzed: rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin //
translated: They are explained as the five kings.

original: 'byung lnga dvangs mar bcas pa ni //
analyzed: 'byung lnga dvangs mar bcas pa ni //
translated: The five elements and the pure essences

original: dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste //
analyzed: dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste //
translated: are the queens, in order to generate delight.🔽The eye and so on, the consciousness of bliss,

original: mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni //🔽gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas //
analyzed: mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni // gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas //

original: nang gi sems dpa' yab yum nyid //
analyzed: nang gi sems dpa' yab yum nyid //
translated: are the inner heroes and heroines.🔽The inner heroes and heroines

original: so so'i rtsa bcung gnas pa'i rten //🔽dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: so so'i rtsa bcung gnas pa'i rten // dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid //
translated: are the supports that abide in the individual nāḍīs and vital drops.🔽The outer heroes and heroines

original: phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni //
analyzed: phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni //
translated: are explained as the sense organs and the four times.

original: gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro //
