original: gang de dvangs mas bskyed pa yis; ;lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas //
analyzed: gang de dvangs mas bskyed pa yis; ;lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas //
translated: The four dharmas of the body, which are produced by the element of water,

original: sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya //
analyzed: sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya //
translated: are to be understood as the father and mother of the four doors.

original: bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid //
analyzed: bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid //
translated: The mind and phenomena are the great bliss of self-awareness.

original: kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid //
analyzed: kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid //
translated: The taste of Samantabhadra is bliss itself.

original: nyon @249b mongs drug gi yul rnams su //
analyzed: nyon @249b mongs drug gi yul rnams su //
translated: In the objects of the six afflictions,

original: sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar pa'o //
translated: the bindu of emanation arises by itself.

original: 'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa //
translated: The benefit of the four disciples

original: sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab //🔽kun kyang dvangs ma'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab // kun kyang dvangs ma'i rang bzhin las //
translated: is the inconceivable activity of emanation.🔽All of them are endowed with the taste of the five pristine consciousnesses

original: ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa //
translated: from the nature of the element of water.

original: gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa //
analyzed: gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa //
translated: They are adorned with the five abodes and essences

original: ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: and are sealed with the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung //
analyzed: sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung //
translated: The seed is the body; the syllable is speech.

original: bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan //
analyzed: bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan //
translated: Bliss is mind; the maṇḍala of body and speech is endowed with the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas //
analyzed: 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas //
translated: The emanation and gathering are included in the fundamental bindu.

original: ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas //
analyzed: ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas //
translated: Since this exists in all bodies without exception,

original: yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya //
analyzed: yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya //
translated: it should be known as the branch.

original: stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa; ;sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi //
analyzed: stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa; ;sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi //
translated: are the signs of family, which are not previously created.

original: rigs rtags gzungs ma blang bar bya //
analyzed: rigs rtags gzungs ma blang bar bya //
translated: One should take the consort.

original: rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas pa //
analyzed: rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas pa //

original: lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya //
analyzed: lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya //

original: rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid //

original: sra ba sa dang gsher ba chu //
analyzed: sra ba sa dang gsher ba chu //

original: drod me bskyod pa rlung nyid de //
analyzed: drod me bskyod pa rlung nyid de //

original: bde ba'i dvangs ma nam mkha' nyid //
analyzed: bde ba'i dvangs ma nam mkha' nyid //

original: brum dbyings bha ga bde ba'i gnas //
analyzed: brum dbyings bha ga bde ba'i gnas //

original: sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang //

original: nyi zla padma nus pa'i gdan //
analyzed: nyi zla padma nus pa'i gdan //

original: che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par ldan //
analyzed: che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par ldan //
translated: is endowed with the perfection of great qualities.

original: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro //

original: lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi //
analyzed: lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi //
translated: is the union of the five aggregates and the five elements.

original: rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas //
analyzed: rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas //

original: ye shes phra rags gnyis su med //🔽thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi //
analyzed: ye shes phra rags gnyis su med // thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi //
translated: The subtle and coarse pristine consciousnesses are nondual.🔽The union of method and wisdom

original: dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas //
analyzed: dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas //
translated: includes the sense organ, object, time, and consciousness.

original: rang rang @250a *//
analyzed: rang rang @250a *//
translated: Each
